sense.def:
Tisto, kar se zgodi
during a period of time
, se dogaja nepretrgoma ali se zgodi večkrat v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: She heated the place during the winter with a huge wood furnace.
Fred had worked with her at Oxford during the war.

sense.def:
Z besedo
during
tudi povemo, da se nekaj zgodi v določenem trenutku nekega obdobja.

seg.quote: He had died during the night.
